original_title: Banda Calypso:  Ao Vivo No Distrito Federal
overview: "Ao Vivo no Distrito Federal" is the seventh DVD of the Brazilian musical group Banda Calypso. It was recorded in Ceilândia, Distrito Federal, on August 8, 2013, in "Maior São João do Cerrado", for an audience of over 100 thousand people. Being released by Radar Records, on November 15 of the same year.
title: Banda Calypso:  Ao Vivo No Distrito Federal
